title: "The Cat Fight has Resumed" - Controversy in the TTRPG Space
itunes:title: "The Cat Fight has Resumed" - Controversy in the TTRPG Space
description:
This week we are discussing the contraversy surrounding Critical Role's new campaign setting Marquet, which is directly inspired by South West Asian and North African cultures. We discuss the promo for this campaign, which has recieved backlash for including colonialist visuals, the subsequent response from the TTRPG community, and, no it's not click-bait, a literal cat-fight.
